name: Escape from Turtle
description:
• :

Our rocket had been crashed and we have to build a new one. But it's not so easy! We landed on a huge turtle and we must escape before he dived into the ocean. All needed (and strange things!) materials we can find on top and bot sides. All you get at the beggining is a blueprint, find materials and build a new rocket (from the bottom of a "recipe"). You can have only 3 items with you! Leave other materials near the workbench and use them when you need it.

  • Tech:

This game is playable only on Windows. 

Keyboard Controls:

Arrow Keys / WASD - Move

Space - Look at the blueprint, leave/use materials, launch the rocket!

Esc/'P' - Close the blueprint window

  • From the creators:

Creating this game gave us tonns of fun. We are proud of how this game looks like after only <24h of creating. Share with Your opinion (and maybe dollar or two! - We will drink for your health!) in comments below. We hope that we will upload more projects soon, see ya!:)
